com.communote.server.persistence.tag

Interface TagStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Orderable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTagStore

    public interface TagStore
extends Orderable
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canHandle(TagStoreType type) 
      int getOrder() 
      String getTagStoreId() 
      String getTagStoreTagId(Tag tag) 
      TagStoreType[] getTypes() 
      boolean isMultilingual() 

    • Method Detail

      • canHandle

        boolean canHandle(TagStoreType type)
        Parameters:
        type - The class to check.
        Returns:
        True, if this TagStore can handle the given class.

      • getOrder

        int getOrder()
        Specified by:
        getOrder in interface Orderable
        Returns:
        the order value which is interpreted as the priority of the tag store. Tag stores with a higher priority will take precedence.

      • getTagStoreId

        String getTagStoreId()
        Returns:
        The alias of this tag store.

      • getTagStoreTagId

        String getTagStoreTagId(Tag tag)
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag.
        Returns:
        The id within this TagStore of this tag. This defaults to the lower case version of the default name of the tag.

      • getTypes

        TagStoreType[] getTypes()
        Returns:
        the classes this tag store handles.

      • isMultilingual

        boolean isMultilingual()
        Returns:
        True, if this TagStore supports multiple languages.
